sentences.en: a pictorial record of their journey
China Pictorial usually sells out soon after it hits the stands.
sentences.cn: 《人民画报》往往一到报摊就销售一空.

sentences.en: Digraphs have a simple pictorial representation.
sentences.cn: 有向图有简单的图形表示.

sentences.en: Diversification of color and pictorial, in response to a different friend's preferences.
sentences.cn: 多样化的颜色及图案, 回应了不同朋友的喜好.

sentences.en: Graphs offer a very general structure for the encoding of pictorial data.
sentences.cn: 图提供了图片数据编码的十分一般的结构.

sentences.en: He had such a fanciful, pictorial way of saying things.
sentences.cn: 他有一种隐晦曲折 、 光怪陆离的表达方式.

sentences.en: News in Pictures - Dedicated to pictorial news stories.
sentences.cn: 在图画的新闻 - 奉献了给图片的新闻故事.

sentences.en: She picked up the pictorial and gave it ( to ) him.
sentences.cn: 她拿起一本 画报 递给了他.

sentences.en: The ancient Maya writing is largely pictorial in Style.
sentences.cn: 古玛雅人的文字在风格上主要是图画.

sentences.en: The branch mentioned above capitalizes on the pictorial aspects of the data.
sentences.cn: 上面我所提到的那个分支是利用数据的图象方面.

sentences.en: The geometrical representation makes the abstract concept pictorial.
sentences.cn: 几何图象使得抽象概念形象化.

sentences.en: The had insisted on a full pictorial coverage of the event.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持要对那一事件做详尽的图片报道.

sentences.en: The pictorial imagery of symbols suits that role better than text does.
sentences.cn: 符号具有的图形表意的外在形象,比文本更适合担当这种角色.

sentences.en: They have insisted on a full pictorial coverage of the event.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持要用图片来报导这些事件.

sentences.en: We have watched the pictorial record of the event.
sentences.cn: 我们已观看了这一事件的图片记录.

sentences.en: When he is in Beijing, he always reads China Pictorial.
sentences.cn: 他在北京的时候总是看《中国画报》.(特别喜欢看它)

words.tran_cn: 象形文字的，绘画文字的

phrases.tran_cn: 绘画作品；图形表示；立体表示法

trans.tran_cn: 绘画的，有图片的，图画似的，形象化的
trans.tran_en: using or relating to paintings, drawings, or photographs
